Title: Kindness Festival 2025 | Where kindness bridges cultures
Description:
Join us for a vibrant evening at the Darwin Waterfront as we celebrate the power of kindness to connect cultures and communities!
Kindness Festival is a vibrant celebration of culture and community in the Northern Territory, proudly presented by Kindness Shake – a local initiative led by international students and young migrants.
 
Now in its 5th year, the festival invites everyone to experience how kindness can connect people across cultures, generations, and backgrounds.
 
𝗪𝗛𝗔𝗧 𝗧𝗢 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗘𝗖𝗧:

    Multicultural parade
    Live music & cultural performances
    Global food stalls
    Interactive art activities & face painting
    Family friendly games
    Fireworks finale

Whether you’re a local, newcomer, student, or simply a fan of great food and community vibes—this night is for you!
 
This event is proudly sponsored by the Northern Territory Government through the 2024-25 Study NT International Student Wellbeing Grants Program.
